name: Could There Bee More
description:
You are a bee with 20 days to live.  How will you spend those days?  Competing with your fellow bees to score points with the Queen or is there something more to being a bee?

Controls:
W and S to move forward and back
A and D to turn
Left-Shift to interact with things
Space to spread pollen

Rest at the hive or at honeycombs to regain stamina, but it will cost you a day so don't slack off!

Credits:
Ben Schmidt - Art and Spaghetti Code
Maria Jernigan - Music Composition and SFX Curation
Zach Long - Programming, UI, and Level Design
